snippet: MGM Resorts International said that it would become the first major casino company to end a longstanding and popular perk: free parking. The move could bring in millions of dollars annually.
abstract: MGM Resorts International announces it will become first major Las Vegas casino company to end free parking at its locations.
lead_paragraph: MGM Resorts International said that it would become the first major casino company to end a longstanding and popular perk: free parking. The move could bring in millions of dollars annually.

headline.main: MGM Resorts’ Las Vegas Casinos to End Free Parking
headline.print_headline: MGM Resorts’ Las Vegas Casinos to End Free Parking
